amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving the effectiveness and efficiency of the Federal regulatory process.

vote.text: Amendment SA 625 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 625 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lankford. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text: CR 3/26/2015 S2017) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to improving the effectiveness and efficiency of the Federal regulatory process.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 625 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 625 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Lankford.
